content.rendered:
An exemplary craft of deluxe living

Edison Othello located in the K block of Bashundhara R/A, is a sublime beauty that ornaments the placid surrounding opted to adorn you with vital necessities of a deluxe residence in the capital. At the Edison Othello each of the expansive living spaces are accompanied with fully equipped gymnasium and community area at tip of the double heighted entrance of this architectural magnificence. 

Features

  1. 3 Bedrooms Apartment
  2. Gymnasium
  3. Prayer Hall
  4. 1 International Standard Lift
  5. Double Height Entrance
  6. Community Space
  7. Children Play Zone

Othello by Edison

Like an ode to the masterpiece by the great English writer William Shakespeare, Edison Othello is a masterpiece craft in residential housing. This north-facing apartment building is truly an architectural masterpiece.

The location of Edison Othello is as lucrative as it gets. In a sense it is place in one of the finest corners of Bashundhara R/A. It is in a grand area, but with a quieter environment. Those who love living luxuriously in a quiet neighborhood will love Othello Apartments by Edison.

Exterior

Featuring a double heighted entrance, entering the Edison Othello apartment building will feel like a grand welcome. There is also beautiful scenic garden and relaxing lobby area maintained at the ground area of the apartment building. The entire ground floor speaks of elegance that is embodied by the building.

Interior

The spacious apartment suites are complement by use of state-of-the-art materials. All designs are done by skilled architects. The living spaces are spacious. All luxurious living amenities are include in every living space. There is also a fully equippe gymnasium for residents to burn the day’s stress away. The roof is beautifully arrange for passing some relaxing time in a Zen environment.

To Conclude

In k block of Bashundhara residential area, there is no other apartment building that can be compare with this project. Its grandeur, offer of luxurious living and a beautiful environment combined makes it a must buy decision for those who are looking a make a purchase of lifetime and live in grand style.
